sentences.en: ...a dream holiday to Jamaica.
sentences.cn: …一个去牙买加的理想假期。

sentences.en: All they ever dream about is getting a hole in one.
sentences.cn: 他们一直梦想着能一杆入穴。

sentences.en: Building a memorial to Columbus has been his lifelong dream.
sentences.cn: 为哥伦布建一座纪念碑是他一生的梦想。

sentences.en: Dean thinks he's going to get the job. Dream on, Babe.
sentences.cn: 迪安认为他会得到那份工作。做梦吧，宝贝。

sentences.en: dreamed up a plan to corner the market.
sentences.cn: 构想出一个计划来垄断市场

sentences.en: Even the European dream is beginning to turn sour.
sentences.cn: 甚至连欧洲之梦都开始破灭了。

sentences.en: Greece is said to be a botanist's dream.
sentences.cn: 据说希腊是植物学家梦寐以求的地方。

sentences.en: He had finally accomplished his dream of becoming a pilot.
sentences.cn: 他最终实现了成为一名飞行员的梦想。

sentences.en: he's been dreaming up new ways of attracting customers.
sentences.cn: 他一直在大胆设想吸引顾客的新办法。

sentences.en: Her dream is to make a movie.
sentences.cn: 她的梦想是要拍一部电影。

sentences.en: Her dream is to present a lifestyle show on television.
sentences.cn: 她的梦想是主持一档电视时尚生活节目。

sentences.en: His ship had sailed like a dream.
sentences.cn: 他的船行驶十分顺畅。

sentences.en: I had lots of dreams last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.en: In a dream you can be transported back in time.
sentences.cn: 在梦里你可以回到过去。

sentences.en: It's as if I'm living in a hazy dream world.
sentences.cn: 我好像生活在缥缈的梦境里。

sentences.en: It’s quite common to dream that you’re falling.
sentences.cn: 梦到自己坠落是常有的事。

sentences.en: Ivor dreamed that he was on a bus.
sentences.cn: 艾弗梦见了他在公共汽车上。

sentences.en: Many people dream of scorching round a racetrack.
sentences.cn: 许多人梦想能绕着跑道飞奔。

sentences.en: My dream is to have a house in the country.
sentences.cn: 我梦想在乡间拥有一栋房子。

sentences.en: My sons would never dream of expecting their clothes to be ironed.
sentences.cn: 我的几个儿子从不指望别人帮他们熨好衣服。

sentences.en: she could never in her wildest dreams have imagined the summer weather in New York.
sentences.cn: 她做梦也无法想像纽约夏天的天气。

sentences.en: She had been dreaming and had not followed the conversation.
sentences.cn: 她一直在走神，没注意听谈话。

sentences.en: stockbrokers command salaries beyond the wildest dreams of most workers.
sentences.cn: 股票经纪人薪水之高是大多数工人做梦也想不到的。

sentences.en: the car is still running like a dream.
sentences.cn: 那辆车行驶起来依然像梦一样完美。

sentences.en: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.--Paulo Coelho
sentences.cn: 世界上只有一样东西可以阻止梦想实现，那就是害怕失败。

sentences.en: Who could ever dream of a disaster like this?
sentences.cn: 谁能想到会发生这样的灾难？

sentences.en: You could waste your whole life on a pipe-dream.
sentences.cn: 白日梦会荒废你一生。

words.tran_cn: 梦想的；空幻的；轻柔的；恍惚的
梦多地；经常容易梦见地
梦似地，朦胧地；爱梦想地
梦想家；做梦的人；不切实际的人
多梦；朦胧；梦幻状态；耽于幻想
梦的；理想的；不切实际的

phrases.tran_cn: 仲夏夜之梦（威廉·莎士比亚的喜剧作品）
大大超过所望的（地），大大出乎意料的（地）
(非正式)做梦（尤在口语中用于讽刺某计划或想法的不现实）
不可能实现的梦；不可能的梦想
同一个世界，同一个梦想（2008北京奥运会的口号）

trans.tran_cn: 梦的；理想的；不切实际的
trans.tran_en: You can use dream to describe something that you think is ideal or perfect, especially if it is something that you thought you would never be able to have or experience

trans.tran_cn: 梦（想），理想，美好的事，胡思乱想
trans.tran_en: a series of thoughts, images, and feelings that you experience when you are asleep
a series of thoughts, images, and feelings that you experience when you are asleep
to think about something that you would like to happen or have
